stage1.title: Welcome!
stage1.p1: You're one step away from using {}!
stage1.p2: Before we start, we need to calculate the amount of water you should drink daily and set up some things to make your experience even better!
stage1.p3: Oh, and don't worry! All data will only be stored on your device, and you can change the settings at any time.

stage2.title: Measurement units
stage2.p1: First, what are the measurement units you prefer to use?

stage3.title: Age and Weight
stage3.p1: In order to calculate the amount of water you should drink daily, we need to know your age and weight.

stage4.title: It's so hot!
stage4.p1: {} can automatically detect the weather conditions in your region and adjust the amount of water you should drink daily. Cool, right?
stage4.p2: Do you want to use this feature?
stage4.checkbox: Yes, I want to use this feature!

stage5.title: Reminders
